projects.title: Healthcare Infrastructure Transformation
projects.description: Architected and implemented comprehensive cloud migration for a major healthcare provider, reducing infrastructure costs by 40% while improving system reliability and compliance with HIPAA standards. Led a team of 15 engineers through the complete transformation.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform Scalability
projects.description: Designed and deployed a highly scalable e-commerce platform serving 2M+ users daily. Implemented microservices architecture with auto-scaling capabilities, resulting in 300% performance improvement during peak traffic.

projects.title: DevOps Automation Pipeline
projects.description: Built a comprehensive CI/CD pipeline that reduced deployment time from 4 hours to 15 minutes. Implemented automated testing, security scanning, and blue-green deployments with zero-downtime releases.

projects.title: Financial Services Security Platform
projects.description: Developed a secure, compliant platform for financial services handling $50M+ in transactions daily. Implemented advanced security measures including encryption at rest/transit, multi-factor authentication, and real-time fraud detection.

projects.title: IoT Data Analytics Platform
projects.description: Built a real-time IoT data processing platform handling 1M+ sensor readings per second. Implemented stream processing with Apache Kafka, real-time analytics with Apache Spark, and predictive maintenance algorithms.

projects.title: Multi-Cloud Disaster Recovery
projects.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive disaster recovery solution spanning AWS, Azure, and GCP. Achieved RTO of 15 minutes and RPO of 5 minutes, ensuring business continuity for critical applications.
